@NRPublicHealth Read The 9 Pages Of The ADVERSE EVENTS 
That Occurred In The 45K Participants In The
PFIZER Trials 3 Months Post Bio-Weapon Injections
https://t.co/HveYyDfYyW

@NRPublicHealth @mustafahirji Niagara Region is not providing informed consent, and Dr Hirji and the staff will be held accountable under the law. 

Its not a threat its a fact in the Nuremberg Code.

@NRPublicHealth Yes I do does the spike protein migrate to other organs in the body? When you receive this gene therapy does it stay in the deltoid muscle like all other vaccines. Is myocarditis and pericarditis a side effect of the gene therapy? What other adverse effects should worry me?
@NRPublicHealth Can you explain the data here? https://t.co/KCJmNcnVGV

@NRPublicHealth @mustafahirji immune-mediated hepatitis, interstitial lung disease, jugular vein embolism, juvenile myoclonic epilepsy, liver injury, low birth weight, multisystem inflammatory syndrome in children, myocarditis, neonatal seizure, pancreatitis, pneumonia, stillbirth, tachycardia,

@NRPublicHealth @mustafahirji The shot isn't safe nor effective and therefore you are committing a crime to say it is safe. fetal distress syndrome, gastrointestinal amyloidosis, generalized tonic-clonic seizure, Hashimoto's encephalopathy, hepatic vascular thrombosis, herpes zoster reactivation,

@NRPublicHealth @mustafahirji death neonatal, deep vein thrombosis, encephalitis brain stem, encephalitis hemorrhagic, frontal lobe epilepsy, foaming at mouth, epileptic psychosis, facial paralysis, fetal distress syndrome, gastrointestinal amyloidosis, generalized tonic-clonic seizure, Hashimoto's

@NRPublicHealth @mustafahirji Pfizer side effects: The list includes acute kidney injury, acute flaccid myelitis, anti-sperm antibody positive, brain stem embolism, brain stem thrombosis, cardiac arrest, cardiac failure, cardiac ventricular thrombosis, cardiogenic shock, central nervous system vasculitis,
